mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MyReserve(myName, myJumin, myPhone, Email, reserveVaccine, reserveTime, reserveCenter, reserveNum ) values(#{myName}, #{myJumin} , #{myPhone}, #{Email}, #{reserveVaccine}, #{reserveTime}, #{reserveCenter}, seq_reserveNum.nextVal)
INSERT INTO OtherReserve(otherName, otherJumin, otherPhone, myPhone) values(#{otherName}, #{otherJumin} , #{otherPhone}, #{myPhone})
